text.__SUMMARY__: Hypericum aciculare is a shrub in the genus Hypericum, in the section Brathys. It is an accepted name according to The Plant List and Tropicos.
text.Distribution:
The species is found across Ecuador, in the regions Azuay and Loga. It is also less frequently found in Peru in Amazonas, Piura, and Cajamarca.
